value:
Get close to someone, and the pain
of parting will be much more acute.
You and Alfonse must remember this.

Hel killed Alfonse's father, King
Gustav. As I was her tool, it's
almost as though I did it myself.

If you want someone to patrol with,
ask Alfonse. I am not your comrade.
But...be careful. Please.

This castle is the mirror of my own.
These surroundings flood me with
memories...many I'd rather forget.

My sword, Sökkvabekkr, is dangerous.
Called the sword of ruin, it is a blade
of the realm of the dead.

I am Líf. Tell me—in this world, what
name does the summoner go by?

What would $Nu
say of this?

I must become stronger. Anything
else means defeat.
There will be no next time...

Ah, $Nu...
No, forget I spoke.

Where...am I? Ah, I see. It's you,
Summoner. I am known as Líf.

I once made a vow to
$Nu...$k$pThe summoner of my world, I mean.
We trusted each other.$k$pI swore that I would keep
$Nu safe...$k$pBut in the end, I was unable to
keep that promise.$k$pAlfonse must not make the same
mistake I did. And I will protect you
myself.$k$pYes, I will continue to fight. Not as
Alfonse, but as Líf. For your sake.
はあっ！
死ね…
ぐっ…！
邪魔を…！
I must be ruthless.
Do not stand in my way.
I will get what I want.
And now, it is your turn.
No, no, no!
ふん…
You have nothing to discuss with me.
If you want to waste time on small talk, seek out Alfonse or Sharena.
I should not be here. I should be dead.
You can weep for your mistakes. You can repent for your sins. But you cannot wash away your past.
Everyone dies. None can return. And yet I keep trying.
Oh, Alfonse... How I envy you...
I have faced despair so many times. Yet, when I am with you, I can grasp hope...
Yes.
Discard all hope.
Death, an ending.
